title: DC
text:
Not to be confused with DC++ , which is a DC client .
IIT Kharagpur has one of the largest DC ( Direct Connect ) networks in India [ 1 ] . Users connect to hubs using DC clients, and are able to share files with each other at high speeds. The most popular hub is HiT Hi FiT Hai .
To quickly get started, see the DC Client Setup Guide .

title: Current hub Address
text:
The current HHFH hub address is dc.metakgp.org as of September 15, 2023. The current active hub is being maintained by MetaKGP .
Note: If you update this IP, please sign.

title: Rules
text:
* Minimum limit for connecting is: 0 GiB. For searching and downloading: 0 GiB. (Will be increased soon)
* Sharing pornography/NSFW links, on main chat, is strictly prohibited.
* Fake sharing is NOT allowed here. Anybody found sharing fakes will be banned immediately.
* Mirror stuff that you download. You can be banned by VIPs for not mirroring stuff that you download.
* Don't share crap like Windows and Program Files directory. You can be kicked or banned for 1-3 hours.
* Upload speed limiting is strictly prohibited. Can lead to a minimum ban time of 8 hours.

title: If you don't have enough files
text:
Disclaimer : It is recommended that you don't use fake file or share improper content. This method might get you banned.
The hub relaxes the sharing limit at the beginning of every academic year for new users to sign up and accumulate data. In case you need to share at some other point in time, try and collect data from friends or message the admins.
It's recommended to share whatever you download, this will help others download the same content from multiple people simultaneously. Ideally, one should have a 1:1 ratio of downloaded vs uploaded content, this includes and is not limited to ebooks, movies, installation files etc. The hub is maintained by the constant efforts from everyone to give back to the community, users are requested to upload data whenever possible.
